title: Terraform on IBM Cloud docs
introduction: Explore the capabilities of the IBM Cloud Provider plug-in for Terraform. You can get started by installing the Terraform CLI and configure the IBM Cloud Provider plug-in  deploying platform services by using Schematics workspaces, and automating cloud operations with Schematics actions. Learn more about how Schematics works and the benefits of using the service.

section_recommended.title: Set up the Terraform CLI and IBM Cloud Provider plug-in
section_recommended.description: Install the Terraform CLI and configure the IBM Cloud Provider plug-in for Terraform so that you can start working with services in IBM Cloud.

section_recommended.title: Create Kubernetes and OpenShift clusters
section_recommended.description: Learn how to create single and multizone IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service or Red Hat OpenShift on IBM Cloud clusters with Terraform.

section_recommended.title: Browse sample Terraform templates
section_recommended.description: Use one of the IBM-provided Terraform templates to quickly provision IBM Cloud services with Terraform.
